reviewText: I was surprised to find that this video is very short - about 10 minutes - so this was not a good value. There is another one in the series that my son has seen at daycare, and I thought I was getting that one. This one focuses on fire safety like knowing your address in case of emergency, etc. Good info, but there is just not much to it.

My grandson loves it. He and i enjoy it every morning together..
It teachs such great values. My grandson nevers tires of it.
